author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Laureate Education - Preliminary Total Enrollments Of 1,067,900 At December 31, 2017 Grew 2.4%
text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - Laureate Education Inc:
* LAUREATE EDUCATION - PRELIMINARY TOTAL ENROLLMENTS OF 1,067,900 AT DECEMBER 31, 2017 GREW 2.4% COMPARED TO DECEMBER 31, 2016 Source text ( bit.ly/2mDrUTF ) Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
